owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: annotatedBy
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The object of the relationship is a resource that identifies the agent responsible for creating the Annotation. This may be either a human or software agent.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: cachedSource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A link to a copy of the Source resource's representation, appropriate for the Annotation.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: default
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The constituent resource of a oa:Choice to use as a default option, if there is no other means to determine which would be most appropriate.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: equivalentTo
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The subject and object resources of the oa:equivalentTo relationship represent the same resource, but potentially have different metadata such as oa:serializedBy, oa:serializedAt and serialization format. oa:equivalentTo is a symmetrical and transitive relationship; if A oa:equivalentTo B, then it is also true that B oa:equivalent A; and that if B oa:equivalentTo C, then it is also true that A oa:equivalentTo C.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasBody
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relationship between Annotation and Body

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasScope
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relationship between a Specific Resource and the resource that provides the scope or context for it in this Annotation.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasSelector
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relationship between a oa:SpecificResource and a oa:Selector.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasSource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relationship between a oa:SpecificResource and the resource that it is a more specific representation of.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasState
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relationship between a oa:SpecificResource and a oa:State resource

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasTarget
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relationship between Annotation and Target

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: item
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relationship between a multiplicity construct node and its constituent resources.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: motivatedBy
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relationship between an Annotation and a Motivation.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: serializedBy
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The object of the relationship is the agent, likely software, responsible for generating the serialization of the Annotation's graph.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: styledBy
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relationship between a oa:Annotation and a oa:Style

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: annotatedAt
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The time at which the Annotation was created created.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: end
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The end position of the segment of text. The last character is not included within the segment.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: exact
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A copy of the text which is being selected, after normalization.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: prefix
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A snippet of text that occurs immediately before the text which is being selected.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: serializedAt
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The time at which the agent referenced by oa:serializedBy generated the first serialization of the Annotation, and any subsequent substantially different one.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: start
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The starting position of the segment of text. The first character in the full text is character position 0, and the character is included within the segment.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: annotatedAt
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The string name of the class used in the CSS description that should be applied to the Specific Resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: suffix
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The snippet of text that occurs immediately after the text which is being selected.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: when
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The timestamp at which the Source resource should be interpreted for the Annotation.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Annotation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A document identified by an HTTP URI that describes, at least, the Body and Target resources involved in the annotation.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Choice
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A multiplicity construct that conveys to a consuming application that it should select one of the constituent resources to display to the user, and not render all of them.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Composite
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A multiplicity construct that conveys to a consuming application that all of the constituent resources are required for the Annotation to be correctly interpreted.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: CssStyle
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which describes styles for resources participating in the Annotation using CSS.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: DataPositionSelector
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class for a Selector which describes a range of data based on its start and end positions within the byte stream.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FragmentSelector
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which describes the segment of interest in a representation, through the use of the fragment identifier component of a URI.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: HttpRequestState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which describes how to retrieve an appropriate representation of the Source resource for the Annotation, based on the HTTP Request headers to send to the server.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: List
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A multiplicity construct that conveys to a consuming application that all of the constituent resources are required for the Annotation to be correctly interpreted, and in a particular order.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Motivation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Motivation for an Annotation is a reason for its creation, and might include things like Replying to another annotation, Commenting on a resource, or Linking to a related resource.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Selector
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which describes the segment of interest in a representation of a Source resource

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SemanticTag
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A class assigned to the Body when it is a semantic tagging resource; a URI that identifies a concept, rather than an embedded string, frequently a term from a controlled vocabulary

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SpecificResource
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which identifies part of another resource, a particular representation of a resource, a resource with styling hints for renders, or any combination of these.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: State
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which describes how to retrieve an appropriate representation of the Source resource for the Annotation.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Style
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which describes the style in which the selection or resource should be rendered.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SvgSelector
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class for a Selector which defines a shape using the SVG standard.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tag
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A class assigned to the Body when it is a tag, such as a embedded text string

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TextPositionSelector
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class for a Selector which describes a range of text based on its start and end positions.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TextQuoteSelector
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class for a Selector that describes a textual segment by means of quoting it, plus passages before or after it.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TimeState
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A resource which describes how to retrieve a representation of the Source resource that is temporally appropriate for the Annotation.

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The motivation that represents the creation of a bookmark to the target resources or recorded point or points within one or more resources.
The motivation that represents the assignment of a classification type, typically from a controlled vocabulary, to the target resource(s).
The motivation that represents a commentary about or review of the target resource(s).
The motivation that represents a description of the target resource(s), as opposed to a comment about them.
The motivation that represents a request for a modification or edit to the target resource.
The motivation that represents a highlighted section of the target resource or segment.
The motivation that represents the assignment of an identity to the target resource(s).
The motivation that represents an assignment of value or quality to the target resource(s).
The concept scheme for Open Annotation Motivations
The motivation that represents asking a question about the target resource(s).
The motivation that represents a reply to a previous statement, either an Annotation or another resource.
The motivation that represents adding a Tag on the target resource(s).
